bandMapping.title: Band mapping, name to index
bandMapping.description: A mapping of band ID to index.

cloudsImage.title: Clouds file name
cloudsImage.description: The file name of the cloud probability image.

generationDate.title: Generation date
generationDate.description: The date on which the product was generated.

sceneCol.title: Scene column index
sceneCol.description: If an interval is subdivided into multiple scenes (or tiles), the column index will reflect adjacent tiles across track starting counting at 1 for left-most scene. The interval will have at least one column, even it the interval is not subdivided.

sceneRow.title: Scene row index
sceneRow.description: If an interval is subdivided into multiple scenes (or tiles), the row index will increment proportionally along track (starting at 1).  The interval will have at least one row, even it the interval is not subdivided.

sensors.title: Sensors
sensors.description: A list of sensor IDs relevant to the product (if required, with preference for hyphenated separators instead of spaces or underscores).

spacecraft.title: Spacecraft ID
spacecraft.description: The ID of the spacecraft (if required, with preference for hyphenated separators instead of spaces or underscores, e.g., 'LANDSAT-7').

temporalRange.title: Time range
temporalRange.description: The UTC start and end date of the product (with leap-seconds included)

descriptor.title: Product descriptor
descriptor.description: Meta-data relevant to the product (Spacecraft, sensor, date-range of the product).

averageHae.title: Average HAE
averageHae.description: The average height above ellipsoid in meters.

averageMsl.title: Average MSL
averageMsl.description: The average mean sea level in meters.

elevation.title: Product elevation details
elevation.description: Details relating to the elevation of the product.

pixelCount.title: Pixel count
pixelCount.description: The total number of pixels across all bands of the product.

sensors.title: Sensor listing
sensors.description: Details relating to the sensors relevant to the product.

cpf.title: CPF file name
cpf.description: The name of the general geometric calibration parameter file used during processing.

rpf.title: RPF file name
rpf.description: The name of the radiometric calibration parameter file used during processing.

ancillaries.title: Sensor-specific ancillaries
ancillaries.description: Ancillary reference files used as calibration input during processing.

ids.title: Detector IDs
ids.description: The detector IDs associated with the sensor.

name.title: Sensor ID
name.description: The name or unique ID for the sensor.

descriptor.title: Sensor details
descriptor.description: Details relating to the imaging sensor (name, detector ID's, etc).

images.title: Sensor images
images.description: Details related to image that were generated that is associated with the sensor.

sunAzimuth.title: Solar azimuth
sunAzimuth.description: From the scene center point on the ground, this is the angle between truth north and the sun (measured clockwise in degrees between 0 and 360).

sunElevation.title: Solar elevation
sunElevation.description: The angle from the tangent of the scene center point to the sun. Measured from the horizon in degrees (-90 to 90). Negative values indicate the sun is below the horizon, e.g. sun elevation of -10 means the data was captured during nautical twilight.

viewAzimuth.title: Azimuth viewing angle
viewAzimuth.description: The angle measured from the sub-satellite point (point on the ground below the platform) between the scene center and true north (Measured clockwise from north in degrees between 0 and 360).

viewIncidence.title: Incidence viewing angle
viewIncidence.description: The angle between the vertical (normal) to the intercepting surface and the line of sight back to the satellite at the scene center (in degrees, between 0 and 90).

viewOffNadir.title: Off-nadir viewing angle
viewOffNadir.description: The angle from the sensor between nadir and the scene center (in degrees, between 0 and 90).

angles.title: View angles
angles.description: Solar and view angles relevant to the image.

bands.title: Band names
bands.description: The names of the bands available in this group.

dimensions.title: Image dimensions
dimensions.description: The pixel dimensions of the image (total rows and columns).

geometry.title: Image geometry
geometry.description: A multi-sequence of (x,y) coordinates forming a closed image outline (with units in the stated projection).

projection.title: Image projection
projection.description: The projection string of the image (e.g., 'EPSG:32629').

precisionBands.title: Precision refined bands
precisionBands.description: The names of the bands that were precision aligned against a reference ortho image, or other ground control points.

systematicBands.title: Systematically corrected bands
systematicBands.description: The name of the bands that were systematically aligned as fallback when precision alignment failed or were disabled.

bandAlignment.title: Geometric band-alignment quality
bandAlignment.description: A listing of which bands were corrected to what quality level. Best results would require that all bands are precision aligned.

quality.title: Geometric correction quality
quality.description: The quality of the geometric corrections applied (e.g., the band-to-band alignment).

resolution.title: Image resolution
resolution.description: The resolution for any pixel in the image (as meters).

geometric.title: Geometric image details
geometric.description: Details relating to the geometric data of the image.

group.title: Group ID
group.description: The ID used to group different bands or their respective detector IDs together. Typically grouped together in the same image file by matching GSD resolutions.

ids.title: Band IDs
ids.description: The IDs of the bands available in this group.

image.title: Image data file name
image.description: The name of the file of which this group refers to.

qaMask.title: Quality mask file name
qaMask.description: The name of the quality mask file of which this group refers to.

earthSunDistance.title: Earth-sun distance
earthSunDistance.description: The average distance between the center of the earth and the center of the sun in Astronomical Units (AU). Typical values are between 0.9832 and 1.0167.

emissiveConstants.title: Emissive constant values
emissiveConstants.description: A list of emissive conversion constant values for for each band.

band.title: Band name
band.description: The name of the imaging band.

constants.title: Emissive constants
constants.description: The emissive constants are model parameters used for radiance to brightness temperature conversion.

esun.title: ESUN values
esun.description: A list of mean exo-atmospheric solar irradiance (ESUN) values for each band.

band.title: Band name
band.description: The name of the imaging band.

units.title: The units of the ESUN measurement

value.title: ESUN value
value.description: The ESUN value of the band in question.

radianceConversion.title: Radiance conversion values
radianceConversion.description: A list of radiance conversion values for for each band.

band.title: Band name
band.description: The name of the imaging band.

gain.title: Band gain
gain.description: The gain of the imaging band.

offset.title: Band offset
offset.description: The offset of the imaging band.

spectral.title: Band spectra
spectral.description: The spectral band layout of the sensor.

band.title: Band name
band.description: The name of the imaging band.

fullWidthHalfMax.title: Bandwidth
fullWidthHalfMax.description: The full-width half-max bandwidth of the band in question (in nanometers).

units.title: Pixel unit representation
units.description: The pixel value representation of the image data (either 'DN' denoting raw digital numbers, or 'TOA Refelectance x 10k' denoting x10,000 scaled top-of-atmosphere reflectance, or 'TOA Brightness Temperature x 10 (K)' denoting x10 scaled top-of-atmosphere brightness temperature in Kelvin).

radiometric.title: Radiometric image details
radiometric.description: Details relating to the radiometric data of the image.

metrics.title: Per detector orthorectification quality
metrics.description: Quality metrics listed by detector ID.

orthorectification.title: Orthorectification quality
orthorectification.description: To what model quality orthorectifcation was achieved (either 'systemic' or 'precision'). Any detector which failed precision refinement will result in a fallback to 'systematic'.

geometric.title: Geometric quality correction metrics
geometric.description: Geometrics quality metrics generated during processing.

software.title: Processing software details
software.description: Details regarding the software used to generate the L1C product.

spectralResponses.title: Spectral response file name
spectralResponses.description: The file name in which all the spectral responses for all bands can be found.

thumbnailImageType.title: Thumbnail image format
thumbnailImageType.description: The image format of the generated thumbnails.

thumbnails.title: L1C product thumbnails
thumbnails.description: Thumbnails of different band or sensor combinations.

image.title: Image file name
image.description: The file name of the thumbnail image

name.title: The thumbnail name or ID
name.description: The ID used to distinguish between different thumbnails

viewingAngles.title: Viewing angles file name
viewingAngles.description: The file name in which all the viewing of the product can be found.

title: L1C product meta-data
description: JSON meta-data file describing the properties of the L1C product.
